company_name: Ma'aden Gold and Base Metals Company (MGBM)
policy_holder: MA'ADEN Gold and Base Metals Company (MGBM)

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Provided within KSA only, limited to heart, liver and kidney, excluding organ cost
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Pre-authorization protocol standard - SR 2,200.00

coverage_details.checkup: SR 999,999,999.99 (no practical limit; also, annual executive medical checkup for CEO and 15 VPs, no restriction. Medical check-ups for new employees at selected clinics to be provided.)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (including Rotavirus, Meningitis, Influenza covered once per year)
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: SR 20,000.00 (Nil deductible. Covered if related to health issue; includes knee replacements if medically necessary)
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: SR 20,000.00 (Nil deductible. Covered if related to health issue; includes knee replacements if medically necessary)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Provided within KSA only, limited to heart, liver and kidney, excluding organ cost
coverage_details.dialysis: SR 180,000.00 (Plus: Renal dialysis for 5 cases up to SR 500,000.00)
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 10,000.00 (Nil deductible for all dental services)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (Life and non-life-threatening, no restriction)
coverage_details.ear_piercing: SR 300.00 (Ear piercing for newborn girls covered)
coverage_details.screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (including breast cancer, PAP smear, Bone densitometry for females >40, PSA for males >40 annually)
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (In-patient physiotherapy covered)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP for outpatient services except for dental, maternity, optics, hearing aids, renal dialysis, and prosthesis where required. Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Organ transplant benefit applies for all schemes except class C. Home care for handicapped and geriatrics covered. Antibody screening and Vitamin D covered immediately if related. Vitamins covered if prescribed for covered conditions. Medical devices such as glucometers, thermometers, CPAP, blood pressure devices, diabetes monitor devices, strips, syringes, oxygen devices, asthma aids etc., all covered if prescribed. Knee/hip replacements when medically needed are covered in and outside KSA including organ cost. Nil deductible for all dental. Road ambulance covered. Freestyle Libre and sensors for diabetes covered. Artificial limbs, prostheses, equipment covered. Dedicated doctor for MA-ADEN care. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
